Study.Citation:
Morahan-Martin, J. and Schumacher, P. (2000). Incidence and
correlates of pathological Internet use among college
students. Computers in Human Behavior, 16, 13-29.

License.en: Freely available for research purposes (verify with original publication)
License.de: Frei verfügbar für Forschungszwecke (mit Originalpublikation überprüfen)

Instructions.en: Please read each statement and select the response that best describes you.
Instructions.de: Bitte lesen Sie jede Aussage und wählen Sie die Antwort, die Sie am besten beschreibt.

Description.en: I have been told I spend too much time online
Description.de: I have been told I spend too much time online

Description.en: If it has been a while since I last logged on, I find it hard to stop thinking about what will be waiting for me when I do
Description.de: If it has been a while since I last logged on, I find it hard to stop thinking about what will be waiting for me when I do

Description.en: I feel guilty about the amount of time I spend online
Description.de: I feel guilty about the amount of time I spend online

Description.en: I have gone online to make myself feel better when I was down or anxious
Description.de: I have gone online to make myself feel better when I was down or anxious

Description.en: I have attempted to spend less time online but have not been able to
Description.de: I have attempted to spend less time online but have not been able to

Description.en: I have routinely cut short on sleep to spend more time online
Description.de: I have routinely cut short on sleep to spend more time online

Description.en: I have used online to talk to others at times when I was feeling isolated
Description.de: I have used online to talk to others at times when I was feeling isolated

Description.en: I have missed classes or work because of online activities
Description.de: I have missed classes or work because of online activities

Description.en: I have gotten into trouble with my employer or school because of being online
Description.de: I have gotten into trouble with my employer or school because of being online

Description.en: I have missed social engagements because of online activities
Description.de: I have missed social engagements because of online activities

Description.en: I have tried to hide from others how much time I am actually online
Description.de: I have tried to hide from others how much time I am actually online
